name: The Legend of DIVES - Mortal Burger Kombat
name_original: The Legend of DIVES - Mortal Burger Kombat
description:
=== PLEASE READ ===

Make sure to use Chrome or Edge to run this game, to avoid difficulties.

If you cannot download the song, try disabling your add blocker!

=== Introduction ===

Welcome to The Legend of DIVES - Mortal Burger Kombat!

Try your luck against the most obnoxious foods you will ever encounter... 

Well, at least they're tasty!

=== Notes ===

Hi! Please give us feedback in the comment section below - especially if they're about bugs you've encountered.

Thank you!

xoxo

=== Credits ===

Developer: https://www.instagram.com/kinayastudios/

Music: https://www.divesmusic.com/
